properties.description: Button deactivation         Values can be: true o false         Default: false
properties.name: disabled

properties.description: Button icon position with respect text         Values can be: left or right         Default: left
properties.name: iconPosition

properties.description: Space that occupy the button inside parent container.        By default, its size adapts to its content        Values can be: true or false        Default: true
properties.name: inline

properties.description: Only indicate for submit buttons         Values can be: submit or valueless         Default: valueless
properties.name: type
